name: Nai Nai Nights
description:
A short adventure / simple farming game  made within the restrictions of a Nokia 3310 phone, created in one week for Nokia Jam 3. The theme is ON/OFF, so you can turn your "phone" off and on again at anytime to pass time quickly.

Features a  Japanese themed fantasy town to explore , 8 items to equip and plenty of secrets to find! Heavily inspired by adventure classics like Link to the Past.

----Controls----

Arrow keys : Walk / Climb

Z  :   Interact
SPACE  : Use Selected Item
X  :   Look
B  :  Open Bag
P  :   See controls in-game
ESCAPE : Turn Phone ON/OFF


All art, code and music was made within the jam period.
Music by my mum
Sound Resources credit to Trix
The rest was by a very exhausted Me!
